content:
I continue to receive the following validator error :
URL value "http://hl7.org/fhir/us/saner/Measure/FEMADailyHospitalCOVID19Reporting" does not resolve
when using HAPI validator .jar wit the IG: http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/fhir-saner.
I see that Inferno validator does not report that error. What do I need to do for HAPI validator to report the same?
